p: The fresh rhizomes of R. crenulata were collected from the Hongyuan county of Aba, Sichuan Province of China in August 2016, and a voucher specimen (CCPC-12) of this plant was deposited at the Coarse Cereal Research & Development Center of Chengdu University. Dr. Peng Lianxin of Chengdu University authenticated the taxonomic identity of the plant material.
